name: Dalton
text: On Play: Give up to one of your opponent's characters -1000 Power for the turn. DON!! x1 Activate: Main Once Per Turn: You may take the top card of your life and add it to your hand: This character gains Rush for the turn. (This card can attack on the turn in which it is played.)

effect.text: Give up to one of your opponent's characters -1000 Power for the turn.
You may take the top card of your life and add it to your hand: This character gains Rush for the turn.
